title: AI Automation Specialist – Expert in Workflow Automation & Azure OpenAI Integration
job_overview:
???? Position Overview:
We’re looking for a top-tier AI Automation Specialist who can build secure, HIPAA-compliant automations using tools like Azure OpenAI and integrate them with CRMs, EHRs, Google Workspace, and APIs.

You must have hands-on experience building complex, real-world automation workflows, ideally in healthcare or secure industries.

???? What You’ll Do:
Design and deploy automation workflows using tools like n8n, Upgrade to see actual info, Power Automate, or custom scripts

Build and integrate Azure OpenAI agents into workflows for text summarization, classification, and interactive AI processes

Work with APIs (REST, GraphQL), webhooks, CRMs, and databases

Connect Google Workspace, JotForm, Airtable, and other platforms

Ensure all automations follow HIPAA-compliant standards

Translate business problems into technical automation solutions

Maintain, optimize, and troubleshoot flows

? Requirements:
Advanced experience with automation tools (n8n, Upgrade to see actual info, Power Automate, Zapier, or similar)

Hands-on experience with Azure OpenAI or Azure Cognitive Services

Strong understanding of REST APIs, JSON, and webhooks

Familiarity with secure data handling, access control, and audit logging

Programming/scripting experience (JavaScript or Python preferred)

Excellent spoken and written English

Highly independent, reliable, and detail-oriented
